name: Hugging Face
purpose: AI model hosting, distribution, and collaboration platform
description: Hugging Face is the leading platform for hosting, sharing, and distributing AI models, datasets, and spaces. It provides infrastructure for downloading pre-trained models, accessing model documentation, and integrating AI models into applications. Primary source for downloading Wan 2.2 models and other open-source AI tools.
cost_structure: Free tier available, paid plans for enterprise features

actual_remote_helpers_usage.primary_use: Download and manage AI models for video generation and other AI tasks
use_cases: Download Wan 2.2 model files (diffusion models, VAE, text encoders)
Access AI model documentation and specifications
Browse available AI models and versions
Download model variants (FP16, FP8, GGUF quantized)
Check model file sizes and VRAM requirements
Access model repositories and version history

key_features.model_hosting: Host and distribute AI models of any size
key_features.version_control: Git-based versioning for models and datasets
key_features.file_browser: Web interface for browsing model files and structure
key_features.documentation: Model cards with usage instructions and specifications
key_features.community: Large community of AI researchers and developers
key_features.api_access: Python API for programmatic model downloading
key_features.spaces: Host interactive AI demos and applications

strengths: Largest repository of open-source AI models
Support for large file storage (Git LFS)
limitations: Large model files require significant bandwidth
Download speeds depend on internet connection
Some models require acceptance of terms/licenses
Large files require Git LFS setup
